mapper.insert:
insert into ClassAll (departId, courseId, courseNameCHS, courseNameEN, moduleId, academicYear, classSemester, classHour, stuNumUpperLimit, teacherId, teacherName, teachingTeamIds, teachingTeamNames, schoolDistrictId, className, instructorId, instructorName, startWeek, endWeek, classDateDesc, classPlaceId, classPlaceName, conflictDesc, scheduled, operatorId, operatorName) values
#{departId}, #{courseId}, #{courseNameCHS}, #{courseNameEN}, #{moduleId}, #{academicYear}, #{classSemester}, #{classHour}, #{stuNumUpperLimit}, #{teacherId}, #{teacherName}, #{teachingTeamIds}, #{teachingTeamNames}, #{schoolDistrictId}, #{className}, #{instructorId}, #{instructorName}, #{startWeek}, #{endWeek}, #{classDateDesc}, #{classPlaceId}, #{classPlaceName}, #{conflictDesc}, #{scheduled}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}
mapper.select: select a.departId,a.courseId,a.courseNameCHS,a.classHour,a.className,b.teaName,b.classChooseNum,b.classPlace,b.startWeek,b.endWeek,b.classDateDescription,c.name from course.ClassAll a join course.Course b on a.id=b.classAllId join course.SchoolDistrict c on a.schoolDistrictId=c.id where a.departId = #{departId} and a.academicYear = #{academicYear} and a.classSemester like #{classSemester}

select a.departId,a.courseId,a.courseNameCHS,a.classHour,a.className,b.teaName,b.classChooseNum,b.classPlace,b.startWeek,b.endWeek,b.classDateDescription,c.name from course.ClassAll a join course.Course b on a.id=b.classAllId join course.SchoolDistrict c on a.schoolDistrictId=c.id where a.classPlaceName = #{roomName} and a.academicYear = #{academicYear} and a.classSemester like #{classSemester}
